Edward G. Robinson Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_G._Robinson_Jr. 0 Edward G. "Manny" Robinson Jr. (March 19, 1933 – February 26, 1974) was an American actor. He was the son of the famous actor Edward G. Robinson and his wife Gladys Lloyd. Edward_G._"_Manny_"_Robinson_Jr. ( March_19_,_1933 – February_26_,_1974 ) was an_American_actor . He was the_son of the_famous_actor_Edward_G._Robinson and his_wife_Gladys_Lloyd .
